mapper.select: match (d:Disease)-[r0:推荐]->(m:Drugs)-[:包含]->(n:Medicine),(d:Disease)-[r1:推荐]->(n) where d.name=#{disName} and r0.p <=6 return m.name as drugs, r0.p as dSort, n.name as medication, r1.rate as meRate order by dSort , meRate desc

match (d:Disease)-[r0:推荐]->(m:Drugs)-[:包含]->(n:Drugs) - [r1:推荐]-(d:Disease) where d.name=#{disName} and r1.p <=6 with r0,r1,m.name as big,n.name as small return small as drugs, r0.p as dSort, big+'('+small+')' as medication, r1.rate as meRate
